###DESCRIPTION###
Agreement When you download and use this mod, you agree to the fact that my mods all connect to a central server to count anonymously how many times you start a game with them. No personal information is transferred in any way, no connection information is stored (the cloud I use does not expose this to me). The purpose is solely for keeping track of how much my mods are used.
If you like this mod, check out my other mods on Steam or GitHub: https://steamcommunity.com/id/brrainz/myworkshopfiles/ https://github.com/pardeike?tab=repositories
Please support me on Patreon, it would mean a lot to me: https://www.patreon.com/pardeike
